snippet: Protesters and supporters of Donald J. Trump confronted each other, screaming and shoving, at a campaign event Friday that was called off over security concerns.
abstract: Trump campaign cancels rally in Chicago minutes amid security concerns as protesters inside arena clash with his supporters; Trump's opponents condemn violence that has taken place at nearly every Trump evebt, and many hold him responsible for tenor of campaign that encourages aggression and violence.

byline.original: By MONICA DAVEY and JULIE BOSMAN
byline.contributor: Ashley Parker contributed reporting from Washington, and Liam Stack from New York.

lead_paragraph: Protesters and supporters of Donald J. Trump confronted each other, screaming and shoving, at a campaign event Friday that was called off over security concerns.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Rally in Chicago Canceled After Violent Scuffles
headline.print_headline: Trump Cancels Chicago Rally Amid a Melee
